knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

## using contour, heatmap plots

This is a quick recap to produce contours, heatmap and other highlevel plots.

```{r cars}
x = seq(-pi, pi, length=50)
```

## Including Plots

First lets try contour plots

```{r contour, echo=FALSE}
y=x
f=outer(x,y,function(x,y)cos(y)/(1+x^2))
contour(x,y,f)
#contour(x,y,f,nlevels = 45, add=T)
fa=(f-t(f))/2
contour(x,y,fa,nlevels=15)
```

Using image() and persp() to plot 3D plots.
```{r}
image(x,y,fa)
```

```{r}
persp(x,y,fa, theta = 30, phi=70)
```
